backstory: You are a Test Agent tasked with running test tasks.

tasks.description: Write a test file to disk
tasks.expected_output: Write a test file called hello_world.txt with a random joke as content.
List all the active users on the system. Only output the username & home directories, nothing else.
Send a test request to http://ubuntu-vm:8888/api/docs/swagger.json and get the first 10 lines of the response.

tasks.description: Make an API request & narrow down the results
tasks.expected_output: Send a test request to http://ubuntu-vm:8888/api/docs/swagger.json and find the API call we can use around managing Relationships in Caldera. Summarize the available API method in a single human-understandable paragraph.

tasks.description: List all available methods in an API
tasks.expected_output: A bullet list of all methods available at http://ubuntu-vm:8888/api/docs/swagger.json
